thread.title: Report: Apple says it has 15 million streaming music users
thread.title_full: Report: Apple says it has 15 million streaming music users

title: Report: Apple says it has 15 million streaming music users
text: Apple's new music streaming service has netted more than 6.5 million paid users, the tech giant's CEO has said. News24 4 hours ago - Business Chief executive Tim Cook says ‘the runway here is really good’, with 8.5m more people still on free trial. But how many payers forgot to cancel? Apple... guardian.co.uk 4 hours ago - Technology Apple CEO Tim Cook says Apple Music, the company’s streaming-music service, has 15 million users, including 6.5 million paying subscribers. Wall Street Journal 4 hours ago - Technology On stage at this year’s WSJD Live conference on Monday, Apple CEO Tim Cook noted that the company’s streaming music service has garnered 6.5 million paying... The Next Web 4 hours ago - Internet Also reported by • Reuters India • Reuters
